00053 Session::Session(Comm *comm, PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, SessionCallback *callback) : m_comm(comm), m_verbose(false), m_silent(false), m_state(STATE_JEOPARDY), m_session_callback(callback) {
00054   uint16_t masterPort;
00055   const char *masterHost;
00056 
00057   m_verbose = props_ptr->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose", false);
00058   m_silent = props_ptr->get_bool("silent", false);
00059   masterHost = props_ptr->get("Hyperspace.Master.Host", "localhost");
00060   masterPort = (uint16_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hyperspace.Master.Port", Master::DEFAULT_MASTER_PORT);
00061   m_grace_period = (uint32_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hyperspace.GracePeriod", Master::DEFAULT_GRACEPERIOD);
00062   m_lease_interval = (uint32_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hyperspace.Lease.Interval", Master::DEFAULT_LEASE_INTERVAL);
00063   m_timeout = m_lease_interval * 2;
00064 
00065   if (!InetAddr::initialize(&m_master_addr, masterHost, masterPort))
00066     exit(1);
00067 
00068   boost::xtime_get(&m_expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00069   m_expire_time.sec += m_grace_period;
00070 
00071   if (m_verbose) {
00072     cout << "Hyperspace.GracePeriod=" << m_grace_period << endl;
00073   }
00074 
00075   m_keepalive_handler_ptr = new ClientKeepaliveHandler(comm, props_ptr, this);
00076 }

00079 }

00081 
00082 int Session::open(ClientHandleStatePtr &handle_state_ptr, CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr, uint64_t *handlep) {
00083   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00084   Hypertable::EventPtr eventPtr;
00085 
00086   handle_state_ptr->handle = 0;
00087   handle_state_ptr->sequencer = 0;
00088   handle_state_ptr->lockStatus = 0;
00089 
00090   if ((handle_state_ptr->openFlags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED)
00091     handle_state_ptr->lockMode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00092   else if ((handle_state_ptr->openFlags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE)
00093     handle_state_ptr->lockMode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00094   else
00095     handle_state_ptr->lockMode = 0;
00096 
00097  try_again:
00098   if (!wait_for_safe())
00099     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00100   
00101   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &syncHandler);
00102   if (error == Error::OK) {
00103     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00104       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get());
00105       if (!m_silent) {
00106         HT_ERRORF("Hyperspace 'open' error, name=%s flags=0x%x events=0x%x : %s",
00107                      handle_state_ptr->normalName.c_str(), handle_state_ptr->openFlags,
00108                      handle_state_ptr->eventMask, Error::get_text(error));
00109         if (m_verbose)
00110           HT_ERRORF("%s", Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr.get()).c_str());
00111       }
00112     }
00113     else {
00114       uint8_t *ptr = eventPtr->message + 4;
00115       size_t remaining = eventPtr->messageLen - 4;
00116       uint8_t cbyte;
00117       if (!Serialization::decode_long(&ptr, &remaining, handlep))
00118         return Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED;
00119       if (!Serialization::decode_byte(&ptr, &remaining, &cbyte))
00120         return Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED;
00121       if (!Serialization::decode_long(&ptr, &remaining, &handle_state_ptr->lockGeneration))
00122         return Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED;
00124       handle_state_ptr->handle = *handlep;
00125       m_keepalive_handler_ptr->register_handle(handle_state_ptr);
00126     }
00127   }
00128   else {
00129     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00130     goto try_again;
00131   }
00132 
00133   return error;
00134 }

00141 int Session::open(const std::string &name, uint32_t flags, HandleCallbackPtr &callback_ptr, uint64_t *handlep) {
00142   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state_ptr( new ClientHandleState() );
00143   std::vector<AttributeT> emptyAttrs;
00144 
00145   handle_state_ptr->openFlags = flags;
00146   handle_state_ptr->eventMask = (callback_ptr) ? callback_ptr->get_event_mask() : 0;
00147   handle_state_ptr->callbackPtr = callback_ptr;
00148   normalize_name(name, handle_state_ptr->normalName);
00149 
00150   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr( Protocol::create_open_request(handle_state_ptr->normalName, flags, callback_ptr, emptyAttrs) );
00151 
00152   return open(handle_state_ptr, cbuf_ptr, handlep);
00153 
00154 }

00161 int Session::create(const std::string &name, uint32_t flags, HandleCallbackPtr &callback_ptr, std::vector<AttributeT> &initAttrs, uint64_t *handlep) {
00162   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state_ptr( new ClientHandleState() );
00163 
00164   handle_state_ptr->openFlags = flags | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE | OPEN_FLAG_EXCL;
00165   handle_state_ptr->eventMask = (callback_ptr) ? callback_ptr->get_event_mask() : 0;
00166   handle_state_ptr->callbackPtr = callback_ptr;
00167   normalize_name(name, handle_state_ptr->normalName);
00168 
00169   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr( Protocol::create_open_request(handle_state_ptr->normalName, handle_state_ptr->openFlags, callback_ptr, initAttrs) );
00170 
00171   return open(handle_state_ptr, cbuf_ptr, handlep);
00172 }

00179 int Session::close(uint64_t handle) {
00180   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00181   Hypertable::EventPtr eventPtr;
00182   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr( Protocol::create_close_request(handle) );
00183 
00184  try_again:
00185   if (!wait_for_safe())
00186     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00187 
00188   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &syncHandler);
00189   if (error == Error::OK) {
00190     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00191       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get());
00192       if (!m_silent) {
00193         HT_ERRORF("Hyperspace 'close' error : %s", Error::get_text(error));
00194         if (m_verbose)
00195           HT_ERRORF("%s", Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr.get()).c_str());
00196       }
00197     }
00198   }
00199   else {
00200     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00201     goto try_again;
00202   }
00203 
00204   return error;
00205 }

00278 int Session::exists(const std::string &name, bool *existsp) {
00279   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00280   Hypertable::EventPtr eventPtr;
00281   std::string normalName;
00282 
00283   normalize_name(name, normalName);
00284 
00285   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr( Protocol::create_exists_request(normalName) );
00286 
00287  try_again:
00288   if (!wait_for_safe())
00289     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00290   
00291   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &syncHandler);
00292   if (error == Error::OK) {
00293     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00294       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get());
00295       if (!m_silent) {
00296         HT_ERRORF("Hyperspace 'exists' error, name=%s : %s", normalName.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00297         if (m_verbose)
00298           HT_ERRORF("%s", Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr.get()).c_str());
00299       }
00300     }
00301     else {
00302       uint8_t *ptr = eventPtr->message + 4;
00303       size_t remaining = eventPtr->messageLen - 4;
00304       uint8_t bval = 0;
00305       if (!Serialization::decode_byte(&ptr, &remaining, &bval))
00306         assert(!"problem decoding return packet");
00307       *existsp = (bval == 0) ? false : true;
00308     }
00309   }
00310   else {
00311     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00312     goto try_again;
00313   }
00314 
00315   return error;
00316 }

00354 int Session::attr_get(uint64_t handle, std::string name, DynamicBuffer &value) {
00355   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00356   Hypertable::EventPtr eventPtr;
00357   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr( Protocol::create_attr_get_request(handle, name) );
00358 
00359  try_again:
00360   if (!wait_for_safe())
00361     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00362 
00363   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &syncHandler);
00364   if (error == Error::OK) {
00365     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00366       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get());
00367       if (!m_silent) {
00368         HT_ERRORF("Hyperspace 'attrget' error, name=%s : %s", name.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00369         if (m_verbose)
00370           HT_ERRORF("%s", Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr.get()).c_str());
00371       }
00372     }
00373     else {
00374       uint8_t *attrValue = 0;
00375       int32_t attrValueLen = 0;
00376       uint8_t *ptr = eventPtr->message + 4;
00377       size_t remaining = eventPtr->messageLen - 4;
00378       if (!Serialization::decode_byte_array(&ptr, &remaining, &attrValue, &attrValueLen)) {
00379         assert(!"problem decoding return packet");
00380       }
00381       value.clear();
00382       value.ensure(attrValueLen+1);
00383       value.addNoCheck(attrValue, attrValueLen);
00384       // nul-terminate to make caller's lives easier
00385       *value.ptr = 0;
00386     }
00387   }
00388   else {
00389     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00390     goto try_again;
00391   }
00392 
00393   return error;
00394 }

00429 int Session::readdir(uint64_t handle, std::vector<struct DirEntryT> &listing) {
00430   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00431   Hypertable::EventPtr eventPtr;
00432   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr( Protocol::create_readdir_request(handle) );
00433 
00434  try_again:
00435   if (!wait_for_safe())
00436     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00437 
00438   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &syncHandler);
00439   if (error == Error::OK) {
00440     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00441       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get());
00442       if (!m_silent) {
00443         HT_ERRORF("Hyperspace 'readdir' error : %s", Error::get_text(error));
00444         if (m_verbose)
00445           HT_ERRORF("%s", Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr.get()).c_str());
00446       }
00447     }
00448     else {
00449       uint8_t *ptr = eventPtr->message + 4;
00450       size_t remaining = eventPtr->messageLen - 4;
00451       uint32_t entryCount;
00452       struct DirEntryT dentry;
00453       if (!Serialization::decode_int(&ptr, &remaining, &entryCount)) {
00454         if (!m_silent)
00455           HT_ERROR("Problem decoding READDIR return packet");
00456         return Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR;
00457       }
00458       listing.clear();
00459       for (uint32_t i=0; i<entryCount; i++) {
00460         if (!Hyperspace::decode_range_dir_entry(&ptr, &remaining, dentry)) {
00461           if (!m_silent)
00462             HT_ERRORF("Problem decoding entry %d of READDIR return packet", i);
00463           return Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR;
00464         }
00465         listing.push_back(dentry);
00466       }
00467     }
00468   }
00469   else {
00470     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00471     goto try_again;
00472   }
00473 
00474   return error;
00475 }

00478 
00479 int Session::lock(uint64_t handle, uint32_t mode, struct LockSequencerT *sequencerp) {
00480   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00481   Hypertable::EventPtr eventPtr;
00482   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr( Protocol::create_lock_request(handle, mode, false) );
00483   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state_ptr;
00484   uint32_t status = 0;
00485 
00486   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state_ptr))
00487     return Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE;
00488 
00489   if (handle_state_ptr->lockStatus != 0)
00490     return Error::HYPERSPACE_ALREADY_LOCKED;
00491 
00492  try_again:
00493   if (!wait_for_safe())
00494     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00495 
00496   {
00497     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(handle_state_ptr->mutex);
00498     sequencerp->mode = mode;
00499     sequencerp->name = handle_state_ptr->normalName;
00500     handle_state_ptr->sequencer = sequencerp;
00501   }
00502 
00503   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &syncHandler);
00504   if (error == Error::OK) {
00505     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00506       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get());
00507       if (!m_silent) {
00508         HT_ERRORF("Hyperspace 'lock' error, name='%s' : %s", handle_state_ptr->normalName.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00509         if (m_verbose)
00510           HT_ERRORF("%s", Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr.get()).c_str());
00511       }
00512     }
00513     else {
00514       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(handle_state_ptr->mutex);
00515       uint8_t *ptr = eventPtr->message + 4;
00516       size_t remaining = eventPtr->messageLen - 4;
00517       handle_state_ptr->lockMode = mode;
00518       if (!Serialization::decode_int(&ptr, &remaining, &status))
00519         assert(!"problem decoding return packet");
00520       if (status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00521         if (!Serialization::decode_long(&ptr, &remaining, &sequencerp->generation))
00522           assert(!"problem decoding return packet");
00523         handle_state_ptr->lockGeneration = sequencerp->generation;
00524         handle_state_ptr->lockStatus = LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED;
00525       }
00526       else {
00527         assert(status == LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00528         handle_state_ptr->lockStatus = LOCK_STATUS_PENDING;
00529         while (handle_state_ptr->lockStatus == LOCK_STATUS_PENDING)
00530           handle_state_ptr->cond.wait(lock);
00531         if (handle_state_ptr->lockStatus == LOCK_STATUS_CANCELLED)
00532           return Error::HYPERSPACE_REQUEST_CANCELLED;
00533         assert(handle_state_ptr->lockStatus == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED);
00534       }
00535     }
00536   }
00537   else {
00538     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00539     goto try_again;
00540   }
00541 
00542   return error;
00543 }
00544 
00545 
00546 
00547 int Session::try_lock(uint64_t handle, uint32_t mode, uint32_t *statusp, struct LockSequencerT *sequencerp) {
00548   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00549   Hypertable::EventPtr eventPtr;
00550   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr( Protocol::create_lock_request(handle, mode, true) );
00551   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state_ptr;
00552 
00553   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state_ptr))
00554     return Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE;
00555 
00556   if (handle_state_ptr->lockStatus != 0)
00557     return Error::HYPERSPACE_ALREADY_LOCKED;
00558 
00559  try_again:
00560   if (!wait_for_safe())
00561     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00562 
00563   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &syncHandler);
00564   if (error == Error::OK) {
00565     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00566       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get());
00567       if (!m_silent) {
00568         HT_ERRORF("Hyperspace 'trylock' error, name='%s' : %s", handle_state_ptr->normalName.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00569         if (m_verbose)
00570           HT_ERRORF("%s", Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr.get()).c_str());
00571       }
00572     }
00573     else {
00574       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(handle_state_ptr->mutex);
00575       uint8_t *ptr = eventPtr->message + 4;
00576       size_t remaining = eventPtr->messageLen - 4;
00577       if (!Serialization::decode_int(&ptr, &remaining, statusp))
00578         assert(!"problem decoding return packet");
00579       if (*statusp == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00580         if (!Serialization::decode_long(&ptr, &remaining, &sequencerp->generation))
00581           assert(!"problem decoding return packet");
00582         sequencerp->mode = mode;
00583         sequencerp->name = handle_state_ptr->normalName;
00584         handle_state_ptr->lockMode = mode;
00585         handle_state_ptr->lockStatus = LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED;
00586         handle_state_ptr->lockGeneration = sequencerp->generation;
00587         handle_state_ptr->sequencer = 0;
00588       }
00589     }
00590   }
00591   else {
00592     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00593     goto try_again;
00594   }
00595 
00596   return error;
00597 }
00598 
00599 
00600 int Session::release(uint64_t handle) {
00601   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00602   Hypertable::EventPtr eventPtr;
00603   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr( Protocol::create_release_request(handle) );
00604   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state_ptr;
00605 
00606   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state_ptr))
00607     return Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE;
00608 
00609  try_again:
00610   if (!wait_for_safe())
00611     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00612 
00613   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &syncHandler);
00614   if (error == Error::OK) {
00615     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(handle_state_ptr->mutex);
00616     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00617       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get());
00618       if (!m_silent) {
00619         HT_ERRORF("Hyperspace 'release' error : %s", Error::get_text(error));
00620         if (m_verbose)
00621           HT_ERRORF("%s", Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr.get()).c_str());
00622       }
00623     }
00624     handle_state_ptr->lockStatus = 0;
00625     handle_state_ptr->cond.notify_all();
00626   }
00627   else {
00628     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00629     goto try_again;
00630   }
00631 
00632   return error;
00633 }
00634 
00635 
00636 
00637 int Session::get_sequencer(uint64_t handle, struct LockSequencerT *sequencerp) {
00638   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state_ptr;
00639 
00640   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state_ptr))
00641     return Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE;
00642 
00643   if (handle_state_ptr->lockGeneration == 0)
00644     return Error::HYPERSPACE_NOT_LOCKED;
00645 
00646   sequencerp->name = handle_state_ptr->normalName;
00647   sequencerp->mode = handle_state_ptr->lockMode;
00648   sequencerp->generation = handle_state_ptr->lockGeneration;
00649 
00650   return Error::OK;
00651 }
00652 
00653 
00656 int Session::check_sequencer(struct LockSequencerT &sequencer) {
00657   HT_WARN("CheckSequencer not implemented.");
00658   return Error::OK;
00659 }
00660 
00661 
00662 
00665 int Session::status() {
00666   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00667   EventPtr eventPtr;
00668   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr( Protocol::create_status_request() );
00669   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &syncHandler);
00670   if (error == Error::OK) {
00671     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00672       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(eventPtr);
00673       if (!m_silent) {
00674         HT_ERRORF("Hyperspace 'status' error : %s", Error::get_text(error));
00675         if (m_verbose)
00676           HT_ERRORF("%s", Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr.get()).c_str());
00677       }
00678     }
00679   }
00680   return error;
00681 }
00682 
00683 
00684 
00685 
00686 
00689 int Session::state_transition(int state) {
00690   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00691   int oldState = m_state;
00692   m_state = state;
00693   if (m_state == STATE_SAFE) {
00694     m_cond.notify_all();
00695     if (m_session_callback && oldState == STATE_JEOPARDY)
00696       m_session_callback->safe();
00697   }
00698   else if (m_state == STATE_JEOPARDY) {
00699     if (m_session_callback && oldState == STATE_SAFE) {
00700       m_session_callback->jeopardy();
00701       boost::xtime_get(&m_expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00702       m_expire_time.sec += m_grace_period;
00703     }
00704   }
00705   else if (m_state == STATE_EXPIRED) {
00706     if (m_session_callback && oldState != STATE_EXPIRED)
00707       m_session_callback->expired();
00708     m_cond.notify_all();
00709   }
00710   return oldState;
00711 }
00712 
00713 
00714 
00717 int Session::get_state() {
00718   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00719   return m_state;
00720 }
00721 
00722 
00725 bool Session::expired() {
00726   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00727   boost::xtime now;
00728   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00729   if (xtime_cmp(m_expire_time, now) < 0)
00730     return true;
00731   return false;
00732 }
00733 
00734 
00737 bool Session::wait_for_connection(long max_wait_secs) {
00738   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00739   boost::xtime dropTime, now;
00740 
00741   boost::xtime_get(&dropTime, boost::TIME_UTC);
00742   dropTime.sec += max_wait_secs;
00743 
00744   while (m_state != STATE_SAFE) {
00745     m_cond.timed_wait(lock, dropTime);
00746     boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00747     if (xtime_cmp(now, dropTime) >= 0)
00748       return false;
00749   }
00750   return true;
00751 }
00752 
00753 
00754 
00755 bool Session::wait_for_safe() {
00756   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00757   while (m_state != STATE_SAFE) {
00758     if (m_state == STATE_EXPIRED)
00759       return false;
00760     m_cond.wait(lock);
00761   }
00762   return true;
00763 }
00764 
00765 int Session::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00766   int error;
00767 
00768   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(m_master_addr, m_timeout, cbuf_ptr, handler)) != Error::OK) {
00769     std::string str;
00770     if (!m_silent)
00771       HT_WARNF("Comm::send_request to Hypertable.Master at %s failed - %s",
00772                   InetAddr::string_format(str, m_master_addr), Error::get_text(error));
00773   }
00774   return error;
00775 }
00776 
00777 
00781 void Session::normalize_name(std::string name, std::string &normal) {
00782 
00783   if (name == "/") {
00784     normal = name;
00785     return;
00786   }
00787 
00788   normal = "";
00789   if (name[0] != '/')
00790     normal += "/";
00791 
00792   if (name.find('/', name.length()-1) == string::npos)
00793     normal += name;
00794   else
00795     normal += name.substr(0, name.length()-1);
00796 }
